thread.title: USD/JPY Slips on Profit Taking, 120-123 Range Seen Short Term
thread.title_full: USD/JPY Slips on Profit Taking, 120-123 Range Seen Short Term - WSJ

author: Hiroyuki Kachi
title: USD/JPY Slips on Profit Taking, 120-123 Range Seen Short Term
text: 0142 GMT [Dow Jones] The USD/JPY slipped on profit taking to 121.12 from 121.45 late Friday in New York, but will likely remain steady in a 120-123 range over the short-term period, says FPG Securities chief executive Koji Fukaya. Due to excessively high hope for extra BOJ easing, the central bank’s likely inaction at its Oct. 30 meeting may bring down the pair lower. But “as long as the possibility of BOJ easing remains pervasive, it’s difficult to assume a considerably higher yen,” says Fukaya. In addition, many investors who assume the Fed’s inability to raise rates this year or wait longer until 2Q next year look... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
